Nashville-Davidson.Meigs School:
Meigs School (or currently Meigs Magnet Middle Prep) is a public magnet school located in Nashville, Tennessee.


== History ==
The school is named in honor of James L. Meigs, Nashville’s second superintendent of public schools. In a report by Superintendent Caldwell in 1880-81 he shared that "at least 150 Negro students had been refused permission to enter a school because there was no room for them.
